channel.title: Okay, new problem! how do i add bonuses to the spirit shields?!
channel.description: okay i just got the spirit shields to work. but how do i add bonuses to them because as of right now there isn't a bonus, thanks.

item.title: Okay, new problem! how do i add bonuses to the spirit shields?!
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

Explisionist:

go in item.java find shield and then where its like {“shield id”,12332,3556 put the shield id there.

thats for id’s, bonuses are in item.cfg
the first 3 numbers are prices, the others are for bonus. most helpfull 1 to know is str bonus, its that 2nd to last one.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay, new problem! how do i add bonuses to the spirit shields?!
